mapper.select: SELECT lec_notice_no lecNoticeNo, opened_lec_no openedLecNo, lect_notice_title lmsNoticeTitle, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate, view View FROM lecture_notice ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.update: UPDATE lms_notice SET lms_notice_count = #{lmsNoticeCount}+1 WHERE lms_notice_no = #{lmsNoticeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT lms_notice_no lmsNoticeNo, account_id accountId, lms_notice_writer lmsNoticeWriter, lms_notice_title lmsNoticeTitle, lms_notice_content lmsNoticeContent, lms_notice_createdate lmsNoticeCreatedate, lms_notice_updatedate lmsNoticeUpdatedate, lms_notice_count lmsNoticeCount FROM lms_notice WHERE lms_notice_no = #{lmsNoticeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE lms_notice SET lms_notice_title = #{lmsNoticeTitle}, lms_notice_content = #{lmsNoticeContent}, lms_notice_updatedate = now() WHERE lms_notice_no = #{lmsNoticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lms_notice( account_id, lms_notice_writer, lms_notice_title, lms_notice_content, lms_notice_createdate, lms_notice_updatedate )VALUES( #{accountId}, #{lmsNoticeWriter}, #{lmsNoticeTitle}, #{lmsNoticeContent}, now(), now() )
